replies.body:
Okay here are some helpful pointers:
1. Your music is too loud
2. Your recording with shadowolf, find someone better.
3. Your keyboard sounds are too loud! Fix your mic or something.
Those are my helpful pointers. By looking at your channel it looks like you're just starting out but that's okay.

replies.body:
Great video! My only suggestion would be to try to reduce the graininess of the video.

Play around with the OBS settings for smoother playback.  I use OBS too. I watched different videos online to find the best setting for me.

You could try:
1) Advanced settings x264 CPU preset 'superfast'
2) Video settings FPS: 30

Also...make sure you are uploading at least 720 HD video, 1080 HD is best!  :)
replies.body_tagged:
Great video! My only suggestion would be to try to reduce the graininess of the video.

Play around with the OBS settings for smoother playback.  I use OBS too. I watched different videos online to find the best setting for me.

You could try:

2) Video settings FPS: 30

Also...make sure you are uploading at least 720 HD video, 1080 HD is best!  :)
